thread.title: JetBlue passenger from NY hits attendant, threatens to blow up plane, FBI says
thread.title_full: JetBlue passenger from NY hits attendant, threatens to blow up plane, FBI says

author: senh
title: JetBlue passenger from NY hits attendant, threatens to blow up plane, FBI says
text: BING NEWS: JetBlue passenger from NY hits attendant, threatens to blow up plane, FBI says WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. — A passenger on a flight from New York City to South Florida has been arrested after authorities say he punched a flight attendant and threatened to blow up the plane. A flight attendant for JetBlue Airways told the FBI he saw ... 10/17/2015 - 8:33 pm | View Link 'Berserk' JetBlue captain's bizarre behaviour began at takeoff, according to criminal complaint A suspended JetBlue ... to crash the plane over the intercom.
